// single ASCII packet example (with no parity bits)
wait 100 ms

// ":" (Start of Frame)
3a
// "01" (Target address)
30 31
// "5b48656c6C6F20576f726c64" = "[Hello World"
35 62 34 38 36 35 36 63 36 43 36 46 32 30 35 37 36 66 37 32 36 63 36 34
// "2030313233343536373839" = " 0123456789"
32 30 33 30 33 31 33 32 33 33 33 34 33 35 33 36 33 37 33 38 33 39
// "20414243444546" = " ABCDEF"
32 30 34 31 34 32 34 33 34 34 34 35 34 36
// "206162636465665D" = " abcdef]"
32 30 36 31 36 32 36 33 36 34 36 35 36 36 35 44
// "3d" = checksum
33 64
// "\r\n" (End of Frame)
0d 0a

rand 75 125 ms

3a
30 32
35 62 34 31 36 31 34 32 36 32 34 33 36 33 34 34 36 34 34 35 36 35 34 36 36 36
32 30 33 39 33 38 33 37 33 36 33 35 33 34 33 33 33 32 33 31 33 30 35 44
33 62
0d 0a
